name: Angry Ragdolls
description:
Angry Ragdolls

It's like the classic mobile game, but in 3D, and you shot ragdolls!

It only has 3 levels because I had no more time to add more. I made the game in ~12 hours straight for a challenge.

The code is available at https://github.com/rhomita/angry-ragdolls! So feel free to add more levels and make a pull request :)

Controls

- Right click to aim, left click to shot.

- Mouse wheel to increase/reduce the power.

- 'R' to restart

- 'ESC' to exit.
